member.name: T:Sage.Connector.DomainContracts.Responses.Severity
member.summary: The status code which can be used on the response end to determine how to handle the data associated with this diagnosis message.

member.name: P:Sage.Connector.DomainContracts.Responses.Diagnosis.Severity
member.summary: The status of the data associated with this Diagnosis

member.name: P:Sage.Connector.DomainContracts.Responses.Diagnosis.RawMessage
member.summary: Techanical detail message such as stack trace.

member.name: F:Sage.Connector.DomainContracts.Responses.Status.Success
member.summary: Success indicates that although there may be diagnosis messages, the action fulfilled the request, so accept it.

member.name: F:Sage.Connector.DomainContracts.Responses.Status.Failure
member.summary: Failure indicates that something happened whether or not there are messages in the diagnosis list.
